sqlMap.select:
/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER01select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR AS 회계년도, A.COPT_CD AS 부호, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_1) AS 징수결정액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 수납액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_3) AS 환부액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_4) AS 불납결손액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_5) AS 미수납액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,( SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A2
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A2.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER02select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR AS 회계년도, B.ACNT_CD AS 부호, A.ACCT_CD AS 소계정, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명, (SELECT C.RMK_2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '23' AND C.ACNT_CD = A.ACNT_CD||A.ACCT_CD) AS 소계정명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_1) AS 징수결정액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 수납액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_3) AS 환부액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_4) AS 불납결손액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_5) AS 미수납액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,( SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A2
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A2.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, A.ACCT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD||A.ACCT_CD ORDER BY 1,2,3

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER03select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR AS 회계년도, A.COPT_CD AS 부호, A.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, A.SAMT2 AS 계산증명액, NVL(B.SAMT, 0) AS 한국은행수납액, A.SAMT2-NVL(B.SAMT,0) AS 차액 FROM (SELECT A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) SAMT2 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) C
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = C.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ) A, ( SELECT A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, SUM(A.MNSUM_CLSG_AMT) SAMT FROM TWFAACAV042L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) C
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011'
AND A.COPT_CD = C.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD ) B WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD(+)

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER04select */ SELECT 회계년도, 부호, 소계정, 회계명, NVL(소계정명, ' ') AS 소계정명, 한은월계금액, 계산증명액, SUM(한은월계금액 - 계산증명액) AS 차액 FROM (SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, B.ACNT_CD 부호, A.ACCT_CD 소계정, B.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, (SELECT C.RMK_2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '23' AND C.ACNT_CD = A.ACNT_CD||A.ACCT_CD) AS 소계정명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 한은월계금액, D.AMT2 AS 계산증명액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, (SELECT D.ACNT_YR, D.ACNT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,1) AS ACCT_CD, SUM(D.MNSUM_CLSG_AMT) AS AMT2 FROM TWFAACAV042L D WHERE D.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND D.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND D.ACNT_CD != '011' GROUP BY D.ACNT_YR, D.ACNT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,1) ) D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.ACNT_YR = D.ACNT_YR AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.ACCT_CD = D.ACCT_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, A.ACCT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD, D.AMT2 ) GROUP BY 회계년도, 부호, 소계정, 회계명, 소계정명, 한은월계금액, 계산증명액 ORDER BY 1,2,3

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER05select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR AS 회계년도, A.COPT_CD AS 부호, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, C.ORG_NM AS 증명기관명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_1) AS 징수결정액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 수납액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_3) AS 환부액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_4) AS 불납결손액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_5) AS 미수납액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV003M C
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = C.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = C.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = C.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = C.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, C.ORG_NM ORDER BY 1,2

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER06select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, A.ACNT_CD 회계, B.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, A.COPT_CD 소관, A.ACNT_CD||A.COPT_CD 부호, C.ACNT_CD_NM 소관명, D.ORG_CD 기관코드, D.ORG_NM 증명기관명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_1) AS 징수결정액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 수납액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_3) AS 환부액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_4) AS 불납결손액, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_5) AS 미수납액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV003M D
,(SELECT B.COPT_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_CD) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD= '01' AND A.COPT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.COPT_CD = D.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = D.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = D.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = D.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.COPT_CD, C.ACNT_CD_NM, D.ORG_CD, D.ORG_NM ORDER BY 1,2,4,5,7

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER07select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR AS 회계년도, A.COPT_CD AS 소관코드, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, C.ACNT_CD AS 부호, NVL(C.ACNT_CD_NM, ' ') AS 기능, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 지출액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD,1,2) = C.ACNT_CD(+) AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '24'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, C.ACNT_CD, C.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY 1,2,4

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER08select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, B.ACNT_CD 회계코드, B.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, NVL((SELECT C.RMK_2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '23' AND C.ACNT_CD = A.ACNT_CD||A.ACCT_CD), ' ') AS 기능, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 지출액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD, A.ACCT_CD ORDER BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD, A.ACCT_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER09select */ SELECT 회계년도, 소관, 소관명, 부호, 기능, 계산증명액, 한은월계금액, SUM(계산증명액 - 한은월계금액) AS 차액 FROM (SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, B.ACNT_CD 소관, B.ACNT_CD_NM 소관명, B.ACNT_CD||SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD, 1, 2) AS 부호, NVL((SELECT C.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '24' AND C.ACNT_CD = SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD, 1, 2)), ' ') AS 기능, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 계산증명액, D.AMT2 AS 한은월계금액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, (SELECT D.ACNT_YR, D.COPT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,2) AS ACCT_CD, D.MNSUM_CLSG_AMT AS AMT2 FROM TWFAACAV042L D WHERE D.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND D.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND D.ACNT_CD = '011' GROUP BY D.ACNT_YR, D.COPT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,2), D.MNSUM_CLSG_AMT ) D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_YR = D.ACNT_YR AND A.COPT_CD = D.COPT_CD AND SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD, 1, 2) = D.ACCT_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, B.ACNT_CD||SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD, 1, 2), SUBSTR(A.CHIF_CD, 1, 2), AMT2 ) GROUP BY 회계년도, 소관, 소관명, 부호, 기능, 계산증명액, 한은월계금액 ORDER BY 1,2,4

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER10select */ SELECT 회계년도, 부호, 소계정, 회계명, NVL(소계정명, ' ') AS 소계정명, 한은월계금액, 계산증명액, SUM(한은월계금액 - 계산증명액) AS 차액 FROM (SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, B.ACNT_CD 부호, A.ACCT_CD 소계정, B.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, (SELECT C.RMK_2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '23' AND C.ACNT_CD = A.ACNT_CD||A.ACCT_CD) AS 소계정명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 한은월계금액, D.AMT2 AS 계산증명액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV024C B, (SELECT D.ACNT_YR, D.ACNT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,1) AS ACCT_CD, SUM(D.MNSUM_CLSG_AMT) AS AMT2 FROM TWFAACAV042L D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE D.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND D.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND D.ACNT_CD <> '011'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY D.ACNT_YR, D.ACNT_CD, SUBSTR(D.ACCT_SUBJ_CD, 1,1) ) D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.ACNT_CD <> '011' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.ACNT_YR = D.ACNT_YR AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.ACCT_CD = D.ACCT_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.DTIL_COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, B.ACNT_CD, A.ACCT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD, D.AMT2 ) GROUP BY 회계년도, 부호, 소계정, 회계명, 소계정명, 한은월계금액, 계산증명액 ORDER BY 1,2,3

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER11select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, A.COPT_CD 소관, (SELECT C.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_CD = A.COPT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02') AS 소관명, B.ORG_NM 증명기관명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 지출액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV003M B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A2
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'
AND A.COPT_CD = A2.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ORG_NM ORDER BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, B.ORG_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER12select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, A.ACNT_CD 회계, A.COPT_CD 소관, A.ACNT_CD||A.COPT_CD 부호, (SELECT C.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_CD = A.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01') AS 회계명, (SELECT C.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C C WHERE C.ACNT_CD = A.COPT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02') AS 소관명, B.ORG_CD 기관구분, B.ORG_NM 증명기관명, SUM(A.TOT_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 지출액 FROM TWFAACAV061L A, TWFAACAV003M B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A2
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.ACNT_CD <> '011' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'
AND A.COPT_CD = A2.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.ACNT_CD, A.COPT_CD, B.ORG_CD, B.ORG_NM ORDER BY A.ACNT_YR, A.ACNT_CD, A.COPT_CD, B.ORG_CD, B.ORG_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER13select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, A.COPT_CD 소관, 'A' 보고서구분, A.ACNT_CD 회계, A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD 부호, F_ORG_INFO(D.ORG_CD,'1') 증명기관명, A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO 증명기관코드, A.CHIF_CD||A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD 하위구분, A.CHIF_CD 장, A.SSEC_CD 관, SUBSTR(A.DITM_CD,1,1)||'000' AS 항, B.ACNT_CD_NM 소관명, C.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 지출액 FROM TWFAACAV025L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV003M D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.COPT_CD = D.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = D.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = D.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = D.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, F_ORG_INFO(D.ORG_CD,'1'), A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, A.CHIF_CD||A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD, A.CHIF_CD, A.SSEC_CD, SUBSTR(A.DITM_CD,1,1), B.ACNT_CD_NM, C.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER14select */ SELECT A.ACNT_YR 회계년도, A.COPT_CD 소관, 'A' 보고서구분, A.ACNT_CD 회계, A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD 부호, F_ORG_INFO(D.ORG_CD,'1') 증명기관명, A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO 증명기관코드, A.SSEC_CD||A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD 하위구분, A.SSEC_CD 관, SUBSTR(A.DITM_CD,1,2) AS 항, B.ACNT_CD_NM 소관명, C.ACNT_CD_NM 회계명, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_1) AS 징수결정액, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS 수납액, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_3) AS 환부액, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_4) AS 불납결손액, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_5) AS 미수납액 FROM TWFAACAV025L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV003M D
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.COPT_CD = D.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = D.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = D.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = D.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, F_ORG_INFO(D.ORG_CD,'1'), A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, A.SSEC_CD||A.COPT_CD||'A'||A.ACNT_CD, A.SSEC_CD, SUBSTR(A.DITM_CD,1,2), B.ACNT_CD_NM, C.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5,7,8

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER15select */ SELECT A.HOIGYENM AS 기금명 ,A.SOKWANNM AS 소관명 ,A.SAMT2 AS 계산서상지출액 ,B.SAMT AS 한국은행지급액 ,A.SAMT2 - B.SAMT AS 차액 FROM( SELECT B.ACNT_CD AS HOIGYECD ,C.ACNT_CD AS SOKWANCD ,B.ACNT_CD_NM AS HOIGYENM ,C.ACNT_CD_NM AS SOKWANNM ,SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS SAMT2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C ,TWFAACAV024C B ,TWFAACAV025L A WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.COPT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' GROUP BY C.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD, C.ACNT_CD_NM, B.ACNT_CD_NM )A, ( SELECT A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS SAMT FROM TWFAACAV025L A WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' GROUP BY A.ACNT_CD, A.COPT_CD )B WHERE A.HOIGYECD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.SOKWANCD = B.COPT_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER16select */ SELECT A.HOIGYENM AS 기금명 ,A.SOKWANNM AS 소관명 ,A.SAMT2 AS 계산서상수납액 ,B.SAMT AS 한국은행수납액 ,A.SAMT2 - B.SAMT AS 차액 FROM( SELECT B.ACNT_CD AS HOIGYECD ,C.ACNT_CD AS SOKWANCD ,B.ACNT_CD_NM AS HOIGYENM ,C.ACNT_CD_NM AS SOKWANNM ,SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS SAMT2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C , TWFAACAV024C B , TWFAACAV025L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.COPT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY C.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD, C.ACNT_CD_NM, B.ACNT_CD_NM )A, ( SELECT A.COPT_CD ,A.ACNT_CD ,SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS SAMT FROM TWFAACAV025L A WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' GROUP BY A.ACNT_CD, A.COPT_CD )B WHERE A.HOIGYECD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.SOKWANCD = B.COPT_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER17select */ SELECT SODIVNCD||HOIGYECD AS GUBUN, SODIVNCD, SODIVNNM, HOIGYECD, HOIGYENM, CODE, ORG_NM, SAMT2, SAMTW, SUM(SAMT2 - SAMTW) AS CHA_SAMT FROM (SELECT A.COPT_CD AS SODIVNCD, C.ACNT_CD_NM AS SODIVNNM, A.ACNT_CD AS HOIGYECD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS HOIGYENM, A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS CODE, D.ORG_NM AS ORG_NM, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS SAMT2, E.AMT2 AS SAMTW FROM TWFAACAV025L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV003M D, (SELECT A.ACNT_YR, A.CLSG_DVSN_CD, A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, A.BLL_CD, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AS AMT2 FROM TWFAACAV025L A WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' GROUP BY A.ACNT_YR, A.CLSG_DVSN_CD, A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, A.BLL_CD, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO ) E
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR = #strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.COPT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.COPT_CD = D.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = D.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = D.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = D.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND D.MDF_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('D') AND A.ACNT_YR = E.ACNT_YR AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD = E.CLSG_DVSN_CD AND A.COPT_CD = E.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = E.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = E.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = E.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = E.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.COPT_CD, C.ACNT_CD_NM, A.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM, A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, D.ORG_NM, E.AMT2 ) GROUP BY SODIVNCD||HOIGYECD, SODIVNCD, SODIVNNM, HOIGYECD, HOIGYENM, CODE, ORG_NM, SAMT2, SAMTW ORDER BY 1, 2, 4, 6

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER18select */ WITH MST AS ( SELECT M.SODIVN_CD || M.HOIGYE_CD AS GUBUN , M.SODIVN_CD , M.SODIVN_NM , M.HOIGYE_CD , M.HOIGYE_NM , A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS SEQ_NO , B.ORG_NM , SUM(A.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AMT , SUM(C.FUND_CLSG_AMT_2) AMT2 FROM TWFAACAV025L A , TWFAACAV003M B , TWFAACAV025L C , ( SELECT DISTINCT D.ACNT_CD AS SODIVN_CD , D.ACNT_CD_NM AS SODIVN_NM , C.ACNT_CD AS HOIGYE_CD , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS HOIGYE_NM FROM TWFAACAV025L A , TWFAACAV003M B , TWFAACAV024C C , TWFAACAV024C D , ( SELECT A.COPT_CD AS SODIVN_CD , COUNT(DISTINCT A.ACNT_CD) AS CNT FROM TWFAACAV025L A, TWFAACAV003M B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR=#strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD='B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' AND A.COPT_CD=B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD=B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD=B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO=B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO=B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.COPT_CD ) MM
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR=#strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD='B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' AND A.COPT_CD=MM.SODIVN_CD AND A.COPT_CD=B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD=B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD=B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO=B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO=B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND (A.ACNT_CD=C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD='01') AND (A.COPT_CD=D.ACNT_CD AND D.ACNT_DVSN_CD='02')
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
) M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE A.BR_CD||A.DIV_CD BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.ACNT_YR=#strYr# AND A.CLSG_DVSN_CD='B' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' AND A.COPT_CD=M.SODIVN_CD AND A.ACNT_CD=M.HOIGYE_CD AND A.COPT_CD=B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD=B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD=B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO=B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO=B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND C.ACNT_YR=A.ACNT_YR AND C.CLSG_DVSN_CD='B' AND C.SUM_DVSN_ID='51' AND A.COPT_CD=C.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD=C.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD=C.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO=C.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO=C.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY M.SODIVN_CD, M.SODIVN_NM, M.HOIGYE_CD, M.HOIGYE_NM, A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, B.ORG_NM ORDER BY GUBUN, A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, B.ORG_NM
)
SELECT GUBUN , SODIVN_CD , SODIVN_NM , HOIGYE_CD , HOIGYE_NM , '0' AS ORD , SEQ_NO , ORG_NM , AMT , AMT2 FROM MST UNION ALL SELECT GUBUN , SODIVN_CD , SODIVN_NM , HOIGYE_CD , HOIGYE_NM , '1' AS ORD , '' AS SEQ_NO , '회계합계 기관수 :' || COUNT(1) AS ORG_NM , SUM(AMT) AS AMT , SUM(AMT2) AS AMT2 FROM MST GROUP BY GUBUN, SODIVN_CD, SODIVN_NM, HOIGYE_CD, HOIGYE_NM UNION ALL SELECT MAX(GUBUN) , SODIVN_CD , SODIVN_NM , '' , '' , '2' AS ORD , '' AS SEQ_NO , '소관합계 기관수 :' || COUNT(1) AS ORG_NM , SUM(AMT) AS AMT , SUM(AMT2) AS AMT2 FROM MST GROUP BY SODIVN_CD, SODIVN_NM ORDER BY SODIVN_CD, SODIVN_NM, HOIGYE_CD, HOIGYE_NM, SEQ_NO

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER19select */ SELECT '000' 회계코드, '총 계' 회계, A.DITM_DVSN_CD 세항구분코드, CASE A.DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '00' THEN '합 계' WHEN '01' THEN '행정재산' WHEN '02' THEN '보존재산' WHEN '03' THEN '일반재산' ELSE A.DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 세항구분명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND (A.DITM_DVSN_CD BETWEEN '01' AND '03' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD = '49')
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.DITM_DVSN_CD
UNION
SELECT A.ACNT_CD 회계코드, '일반회계' 회계, A.DITM_DVSN_CD 세항구분코드, CASE A.DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '00' THEN '합 계' WHEN '01' THEN '행정재산' WHEN '02' THEN '보존재산' WHEN '03' THEN '일반재산' ELSE A.DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 세항구분명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND (A.DITM_DVSN_CD BETWEEN '01' AND '03' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD = '49') AND A.ACNT_CD = '011'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.ACNT_CD, A.DITM_DVSN_CD
UNION
SELECT '299' AS 회계코드, '특별회계' 회계, A.DITM_DVSN_CD 세항구분코드, CASE A.DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '00' THEN '합 계' WHEN '01' THEN '행정재산' WHEN '02' THEN '보존재산' WHEN '03' THEN '일반재산' ELSE A.DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 세항구분명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND (A.DITM_DVSN_CD BETWEEN '01' AND '03' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD = '49') AND (A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD < '300')
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.DITM_DVSN_CD
UNION
SELECT '300' AS 회계코드, '기 금' 회계, A.DITM_DVSN_CD 세항구분코드, CASE A.DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '00' THEN '합 계' WHEN '01' THEN '행정재산' WHEN '02' THEN '보존재산' WHEN '03' THEN '일반재산' ELSE A.DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 세항구분명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND (A.DITM_DVSN_CD BETWEEN '01' AND '03' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD = '49') AND A.ACNT_CD >= '300'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.DITM_DVSN_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER20select */ SELECT CASE A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '01' THEN '일반토지' WHEN '02' THEN '임 야' WHEN '03' THEN '공공용지' WHEN '04' THEN '토지소계' WHEN '05' THEN '건 물' WHEN '06' THEN '공 작 물' WHEN '07' THEN '기계기구' WHEN '08' THEN '임 목 죽' WHEN '09' THEN '선 박' WHEN '10' THEN '항 공 기' WHEN '11' THEN '출자증권' WHEN '12' THEN '주 식' WHEN '13' THEN '채 권' WHEN '14' THEN '증권소계' WHEN '15' THEN '무체재산' ELSE A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 종류별, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 수량2, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 금액2, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 수량3, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 금액3 FROM TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('49','00',' 0','25','36','57','04','14')
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER21select */ SELECT B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관별 ,SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도말현재 ,SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증 ,SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감 ,SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재 FROM TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID NOT IN ('49','51') AND TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('49','04','14') AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER22select */ SELECT B.ACNT_CD_NM as 소관별 ,SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도말현재 ,SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증 ,SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감 ,SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재 FROM TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID NOT IN ('49','51') AND TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('49','04','14') AND A.ACNT_CD <> '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER23select */ SELECT '1' AS 구분 , B.ACNT_CD AS 회계코드 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계코드명 , SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격 , SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 , SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 , SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD < '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS 구분 , B.ACNT_CD AS 회계코드 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계코드명 , SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격 , SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 , SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 , SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 FROM TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.ACNT_CD >= '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER24select */ WITH SQL_MST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT B.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD1 , C.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD2 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM1 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
)
SELECT M.ACNT_CD1 || M.ACNT_CD2 || 'SQL01' AS 구분 , M.ACNT_CD_NM1 AS 소관명 , M.ACNT_CD_NM2 AS 회계명 , '국유재산 증감 및 현재액 검산액표' AS 타이틀 , CASE A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '01' THEN '일반토지' WHEN '02' THEN '임 야' WHEN '03' THEN '공공용지' WHEN '04' THEN '토지소계' WHEN '05' THEN '건 물' WHEN '06' THEN '공 작 물' WHEN '07' THEN '기계기구' WHEN '08' THEN '임 목 죽' WHEN '09' THEN '선 박' WHEN '10' THEN '항 공 기' WHEN '11' THEN '출자증권' WHEN '12' THEN '주 식' WHEN '13' THEN '채 권' WHEN '14' THEN '증권소계' WHEN '15' THEN '무체재산' ELSE A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD END AS 세세항구분코드 , SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년말현재액수량 , SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년말현재액가격 , SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량 , SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 , SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량 , SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 , SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도말현재액수량 , SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 , A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD , '(행정재산)' AS TEXT1 FROM TWFAACAV046L A, SQL_MST M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.ACNT_CD = M.ACNT_CD2 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.DITM_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('49','04','14')

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD NOT IN ('49','04','14')
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD, M.ACNT_CD1, M.ACNT_CD_NM1 ORDER BY 1, A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER25select */ SELECT CASE A.SUM_DVSN_ID WHEN '01' THEN '전기·통신기기' WHEN '02' THEN '사무용기기' WHEN '03' THEN '사무용집기' WHEN '04' THEN '운반·건설기계, 차량' WHEN '05' THEN '기계요소, 공작기계' WHEN '06' THEN '산업기계' WHEN '07' THEN '의료 및 화학분석기기' WHEN '08' THEN '물리시험 및 측정기기' WHEN '09' THEN '기타 실험장비' WHEN '10' THEN '기타 잡기기' WHEN '11' THEN '인쇄, 사진 및 시청각기기' ELSE '기타' END AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '00' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != 'XX'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.SUM_DVSN_ID ORDER BY A.SUM_DVSN_ID

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER26select */ SELECT B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO = '0000' AND A.ACNT_CD = '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'

AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER27select */ SELECT B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO = '0000' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER28select */ SELECT '특별회계합계' AS 구분, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD < '190' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'

GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM UNION ALL SELECT '기업회계합계' AS 구분, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD >= '190' AND A.ACNT_CD < '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER29select */ SELECT B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, TWFAACAV024C B

WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '00' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000' AND A.ACNT_CD >= '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER30select */ WITH SQL_MST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT B.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD1 , C.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD2 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM1 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV046L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '00' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
)
SELECT M.ACNT_CD1 || M.ACNT_CD2||'SQL01' AS 구분, '물품종류별 증감 및 현재액 검산액표(회계별 합계)' AS 타이틀, M.ACNT_CD1 AS 소관코드, M.ACNT_CD2 AS 회계코드, M.ACNT_CD_NM1 AS 소관명, M.ACNT_CD_NM2 AS 회계명, A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS ID, CASE A.SUM_DVSN_ID WHEN '01' THEN '전기·통신기기' WHEN '02' THEN '사무용기기' WHEN '03' THEN '사무용집기' WHEN '04' THEN '운반·건설기계, 차량' WHEN '05' THEN '기계요소, 공작기계' WHEN '06' THEN '산업기계' WHEN '07' THEN '의료 및 화학분석기기' WHEN '08' THEN '물리시험 및 측정기기' WHEN '09' THEN '기타 실험장비' WHEN '10' THEN '기타 잡기기' WHEN '11' THEN '인쇄, 사진 및 시청각기기' ELSE '기타' END AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, SQL_MST M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.ACNT_CD = M.ACNT_CD2 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000'

GROUP BY M.ACNT_CD1, M.ACNT_CD2, M.ACNT_CD_NM1, M.ACNT_CD_NM2, A.SUM_DVSN_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT M.ACNT_CD1||'SQL02' AS 구분, '물품종류별 증감 및 현재액 검산액표(소관 합계)' AS 타이틀, M.ACNT_CD1 AS 소관코드, '' AS 회계코드, M.ACNT_CD_NM1 AS 소관명, '' AS 회계명, A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS ID, CASE A.SUM_DVSN_ID WHEN '01' THEN '전기·통신기기' WHEN '02' THEN '사무용기기' WHEN '03' THEN '사무용집기' WHEN '04' THEN '운반·건설기계, 차량' WHEN '05' THEN '기계요소, 공작기계' WHEN '06' THEN '산업기계' WHEN '07' THEN '의료 및 화학분석기기' WHEN '08' THEN '물리시험 및 측정기기' WHEN '09' THEN '기타 실험장비' WHEN '10' THEN '기타 잡기기' WHEN '11' THEN '인쇄, 사진 및 시청각기기' ELSE '기타' END AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도수량, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도금액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가금액, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량, SUM(A.THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소금액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도수량, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도금액 FROM TWFAACAV031L A, SQL_MST M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.ACNT_CD = M.ACNT_CD2 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.GDS_SRNO != '0000'

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER31select */ SELECT #strYr# AS 회계연도, B.EXTL_CD, B.EXTL_CD_NM AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총계, SUM(A.LO_ATAG) AS 결손액누계 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV023C B

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1

GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER33select */ SELECT #strYr# AS 회계연도, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총계, SUM(A.LO_ATAG) AS 결손액누계 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER34select */ SELECT #strYr# AS 회계연도, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총계, SUM(A.LO_ATAG) AS 결손액누계 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD < '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER35select */ SELECT #strYr# AS 회계연도, B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총계, SUM(A.LO_ATAG) AS 결손액누계 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV024C B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.ACNT_CD != '011' AND A.ACNT_CD >= '300' AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM ORDER BY B.ACNT_CD, B.ACNT_CD_NM

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER36select */ WITH SQL_MST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT B.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD1 , C.ACNT_CD AS ACNT_CD2 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM1 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS ACNT_CD_NM2 FROM TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV013L A WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49' AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' ) SELECT M.ACNT_CD1||M.ACNT_CD2||'SQL01' AS 구분, #strYr#||' 회계연도 국가채권 현재액 검산액표' AS 타이틀, M.ACNT_CD1 AS 소관코드, M.ACNT_CD2 AS 회계코드, M.ACNT_CD_NM1 AS 소관명, M.ACNT_CD_NM2 AS 회계명, B.EXTL_CD AS ID, B.EXTL_CD_NM AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT + A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 이행기간도래액합계, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT + A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 이행기간미도래액합계, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 계, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV023C B, SQL_MST M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND B.EXTL_DVSN_CD = '3' AND B.EXTL_CD = A.SSEC_CD AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.ACNT_CD = M.ACNT_CD2 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY M.ACNT_CD1, M.ACNT_CD2, M.ACNT_CD_NM1, M.ACNT_CD_NM2, B.EXTL_CD, B.EXTL_CD_NM
UNION ALL
SELECT M.ACNT_CD1||'SQL02' AS 구분, '국가채권 현재액 검산액표(소관별)' AS 타이틀, M.ACNT_CD1 AS 소관코드, '' AS 회계코드, M.ACNT_CD_NM1 AS 소관명, '' AS 회계명, B.EXTL_CD AS ID, B.EXTL_CD_NM AS 종류별, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년이전이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년이전발생액합계금액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생이행기한미도래액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액합계금액, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT + A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 이행기간도래액합계, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT + A.THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 이행기간미도래액합계, SUM(A.LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM + A.THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 계, SUM(A.MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리지정액합계금액 FROM TWFAACAV013L A, TWFAACAV023C B, SQL_MST M
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND B.EXTL_DVSN_CD = '3' AND B.EXTL_CD = A.SSEC_CD AND A.COPT_CD = M.ACNT_CD1 AND A.ACNT_CD = M.ACNT_CD2 AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID != '49'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY M.ACNT_CD1, M.ACNT_CD_NM1, B.EXTL_CD, B.EXTL_CD_NM ORDER BY 1, 7, 3

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER37select */ SELECT 보고서제목, 보고서출력구분, 구분명, 채무증감번호, 세구분코드, 하위구분, 전년도말현재액, 본년도한도액, 본년도채무행위액, 본년도차액, 본년도상환소멸액, 본년도말현재액, 이자지급액 FROM (SELECT '국가채무증감 및 현재액 집계표' AS 보고서제목, 'A' 보고서출력구분, '총 계' AS 구분명, 'A00' AS 채무증감번호, A.TAX_DVSN_CD 세구분코드, '00'||A.TAX_DVSN_CD 하위구분, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 전년도말현재액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) 본년도한도액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) 본년도채무행위액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) 본년도차액, SUM(A.THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) 본년도상환소멸액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액, SUM(A.INT_PMT_AMT) 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV036L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.TAX_DVSN_CD UNION SELECT '국가채무증감 및 현재액 집계표' AS 보고서제목, 'A' 보고서출력구분, CASE A.LBT_VRT_NO WHEN '01' THEN '차 입 금' WHEN '02' THEN '국 채' WHEN '03' THEN '국고채무부담행위' WHEN '04' THEN '채 무 보 증' END AS 구분명, 'A'||A.LBT_VRT_NO AS 채무증감번호, A.TAX_DVSN_CD 세구분코드, A.LBT_VRT_NO||A.TAX_DVSN_CD 하위구분, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 전년도말현재액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) 본년도한도액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) 본년도채무행위액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) 본년도차액, SUM(A.THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) 본년도상환소멸액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액, SUM(A.INT_PMT_AMT) 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV036L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.LBT_VRT_NO, A.TAX_DVSN_CD ORDER BY 2,4,3,5,6 )
UNION ALL
SELECT 보고서제목, 보고서출력구분, 구분명, 채무증감번호, 세구분코드, 하위구분, 전년도말현재액, 본년도한도액, 본년도채무행위액, 본년도차액, 본년도상환소멸액, 본년도말현재액, 이자지급액 FROM (SELECT '국가채무증감 및 현재액 집계표(국내차입금)' AS 보고서제목, 'B' 보고서출력구분, CASE SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,2,1) WHEN '1' THEN '한국은행차입금' WHEN '2' THEN '기타차입금' ELSE ' ' END AS 구분명, (SELECT B.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C B WHERE B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '20' AND B.ACNT_CD = SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM, 3,3)) 채무증감번호, CASE SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,6,1) WHEN '0' THEN ' ' WHEN '1' THEN '장기차입금' WHEN '2' THEN '일시차입금' ELSE ' ' END AS 세구분코드, ' ' AS 하위구분, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 전년도말현재액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) 본년도한도액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) 본년도채무행위액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) 본년도차액, SUM(A.THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) 본년도상환소멸액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액, SUM(A.INT_PMT_AMT) 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV036L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.LBT_VRT_NO = '01' AND SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,1,1) = '1'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.LBT_VRT_NO, A.DVSN_NM ORDER BY 2,3,4,5 )
UNION ALL
SELECT 보고서제목, 보고서출력구분, 구분명, 채무증감번호, 세구분코드, 하위구분, 전년도말현재액, 본년도한도액, 본년도채무행위액, 본년도차액, 본년도상환소멸액, 본년도말현재액, 이자지급액 FROM (SELECT '국가채무증감 및 현재액 집계표(해외차입금)' AS 보고서제목, 'C' 보고서출력구분, '총 계' AS 구분명, 'C'||'00' AS 채무증감번호, A.TAX_DVSN_CD 세구분코드, A.LBT_VRT_NO||A.TAX_DVSN_CD 하위구분, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 전년도말현재액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) 본년도한도액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) 본년도채무행위액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) 본년도차액, SUM(A.THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) 본년도상환소멸액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액, SUM(A.INT_PMT_AMT) 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV036L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.LBT_VRT_NO = '01' AND SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,1,1) = '2'

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1

AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD

GROUP BY A.LBT_VRT_NO, A.TAX_DVSN_CD, A.DVSN_NM UNION SELECT '국가채무증감 및 현재액 집계표(국채)' AS 보고서제목, 'D' 보고서출력구분, (SELECT B.ACNT_CD_NM FROM TWFAACAV024C B WHERE B.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '21' AND B.ACNT_CD = SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM, 3,3)) AS 구분명, ' ' AS 채무증감번호, ' ' AS 세구분코드, ' ' AS 하위구분, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 전년도말현재액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) 본년도한도액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) 본년도채무행위액, SUM(A.THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) 본년도차액, SUM(A.THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) 본년도상환소멸액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액, SUM(A.INT_PMT_AMT) 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV036L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.LBT_VRT_NO = '02' AND SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,1,1) = '0'

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.LBT_VRT_NO = '03' AND SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,1,1) = '0'

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '11' AND A.LBT_VRT_NO = '03' AND SUBSTR(A.DVSN_NM,1,1) = '0'

,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER38select */ SELECT CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='11' THEN TRIM(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,1,50)) ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,1,108)) END AS 구분 ,CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='11' THEN TRIM(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,51,50)) ELSE '' END AS 상환방법 ,CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='11' THEN TRIM(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,101,16)) ELSE '' END AS 이율 ,CASE WHEN SUM_DVSN_ID='11' THEN TRIM(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,117,8)) ELSE '' END AS 차입일 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,125,16)) AS 전년도말현재액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,141,16)) AS 본년도한도액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,157,16)) AS 본년도채무행위액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,173,16)) AS 본년도차액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,189,16)) AS 본년도상환소멸액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,205,16)) AS 본년도말현재액 ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(ATT_TXT,221,16)) AS 이자지급액 FROM TWFAACAV009L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER42select_New */ SELECT CASE LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTR(A.ATT_TXT, 0, 1))) WHEN '0' THEN '[상환조정계수]' WHEN '1' THEN '[환율변동]' ELSE ' ' END AS 구분, TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 2, 20)) AS 구분명, TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 22, 50)) AS 사업명, CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 72, 50)) END AS 채무자,
CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 122, 50)) END AS 채권자, CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 172, 8)) END AS 보증일자, CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 180, 16)) END AS 이율, CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID='49' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 196, 4)) END AS 기한, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 200, 17)) AS 보증한도액, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 217, 17)) AS 보증누계, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 234, 17)) AS 전년도말현재액, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 251, 17)) AS 본년도중보증액, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 268, 17)) AS 본년도중상환소멸액, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 285, 17)) AS 현재액, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 302, 17)) AS 연체원금, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRB(A.ATT_TXT, 319, 17)) AS 연체이자 FROM TWFAACAV009L A, (SELECT COPT_CD, ACNT_CD, BLL_CD, PROF_DRTR_SRNO, DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO FROM TWFAACAV003M WHERE BLL_CD = '31') B
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND A.ATT_CD = 'ATC170205' AND A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
ORDER BY A.COPT_CD, A.ACNT_CD, A.BLL_CD, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO, A.SRNO

/* faa/cav/045/FAACAV045ER43select */ SELECT A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS 구분, CASE A.DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '0' THEN '합계' WHEN '1' THEN '정부소유분' WHEN '2' THEN '정부보관분' ELSE ' ' END AS 소유구분, CASE A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD WHEN '0' THEN '소계' WHEN '1' THEN '국채' WHEN '2' THEN '주식' WHEN '3' THEN '기타' WHEN '9' THEN A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD ELSE ' ' END AS 종류, SUM(A.LTYR_ED_CRFW_SHCN) 전년도이월장수, SUM(A.LTYR_CRFW_PF_AMT) 전년도이월권면액, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_SHCN) 본년도증가장수, SUM(A.THYR_INCR_PF_AMT) 본년도증가권면액, SUM(A.THYR_MIS_SHCN) 본년도감수장수, SUM(A.THYR_MIS_PF_AMT) 본년도감수권면액, SUM(A.THYR_ED_CRNT_STK_SHCN) 본년도말현재고장수, SUM(A.THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) 본년도말현재액 FROM TWFAACAV057L A
,(SELECT B.COPT_SG_CD FROM TWFAACAV003M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE RPAD(A.BR_CD,3,'0')||RPAD(A.DIV_CD,3,'0') BETWEEN #strBr1#||#strDiv1# AND #strBr2#||#strDiv2# AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY B.COPT_SG_CD ) A1
WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00'
AND A.COPT_CD = A1.COPT_SG_CD
AND A.COPT_CD BETWEEN #strCopt1# AND #strCopt2#
GROUP BY A.SUM_DVSN_ID, A.DITM_DVSN_CD, A.TAX_DITM_DVSN_CD
